input.sentences: someone went on a walk through a small town .
they saw some decorations in the park .
they also saw a pretty little church
and took a walk through its graveyard .
output.sentences: The Historical District was very interesting to see.
There were all kinds of statues.
Seeing the King's Arms Motel was one of the highlights of the day.
However, the old church was equally as interesting.
There was a graveyard in the back that homed a lot of famous people of the past.
